name: Central Maine Healthcare
address: Multiple locations, including Central Maine Medical Center in Lewiston
description: Offers comprehensive maternity care, including prenatal care, childbirth services, and postpartum support to help new parents. They emphasize a comfortable and supportive environment for birth and recovery
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Northern Light Health
address: Multiple locations across Maine, including Northern Light Eastern Maine Medical Center in Bangor
description: Provides a range of pregnancy and birthing services, including prenatal care, childbirth care, and postpartum care and encouragement. They focus on a family-centered approach and offer support for physical, emotional, and spiritual needs
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: MaineHealth
address: Multiple locations, including Maine Medical Center Portland
phone: 207-771-5549 (for Obstetrics and Gynecology at Maine Medical Center Portland)
description: Offers a nurturing, family-centered environment for labor, delivery, and post-birth care. They provide advanced medical expertise and support services, including a Level IV Neonatal Intensive Care Unit (NICU)
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Planned Parenthood Maine (Portland Health Center)
description: Offers prenatal and postpartum services, including private appointments and telehealth options. They also provide a range of other reproductive health services
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Crossroads (Scarborough and Windham)
description: Offers a residential treatment program for pregnant and postpartum women, which includes childcare and parenting education as part of addiction recovery
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Wellspring Infinity House (Bangor)
description: A long-term residential treatment program for pregnant and parenting women, addressing substance use and co-occurring mental health disorders
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Lincoln Medical Partners Women's Center
description: Partners with MaineMOM to provide health and addiction services to pregnant and postpartum women, offering behavioral health and women's health services. They have a 5-star Google rating
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Casco Bay Recovery
description: Offers outpatient treatment, including a program for women with options for pregnant people. They have a 5-star Google rating and Joint Commission accreditation
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: Postpartum Support International (PSI) - Maine Chapter
address: Serves the entire state of Maine
description: A non-profit organization dedicated to helping those suffering from perinatal mood disorders. They offer a helpline, resources, and can connect individuals with trained providers in Maine
services: Baby-Boomer-owned Postnatal recovery in Maine consultation

name: MaineGeneral Health
description: Offers a Postpartum Support Group and various other family support programs, including home visiting services for parenting support
